name: Rohit Kumar
summary: Experienced full-stack software engineer with a strong background in Python, Web development, APIs, and AWS services. Proven track record of delivering innovative web applications and enhancing product performance. Familiar with LLM Dev pipelines.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Contributed to the development of DomainMCF and Maptek Geology Core enhancing software performance and functionality using C#, Python, React, TypeScript, REST APIs, AWS, and Front-end technologies.
Drove the innovation of experimental products with Python, React, TypeScript, Docker, AWS, SQL, and LLM, significantly advancing our product offerings and R&D.
Utilised Python with Selenium to test web products, developed using React and deployed with Docker and AWS, for two years.
Conducted comprehensive code reviews and provided QA feedback, leading to a 25% reduction in post-deployment issues and a 15% improvement in code quality metrics.
Coordinated robust deployment strategies on AWS S3 with CloudFront & Lambda integration. This included creating and testing RESTful APIs in Flask and Swagger.
Created and tested RESTful services using Flask, JavaScript, Swagger, and pytest, ensuring comprehensive test coverage.
Developed server-side scripts using Flask and FastAPI, to add LLMs to enhance data processing and automation capabilities.
achievements: Optimised Data Processing: Achieved a breakthrough in processing 200,000 points, cutting runtime from 6 minutes to under 20 seconds, significantly enhancing efficiency.
Leadership & Knowledge Sharing: Presented a tech talk on my block coalescing work, highlighting my role as a thought leader and raising a lot of discussion.

Initiated and led a UI component testing project using Tailwind CSS, React, and Selenium, enhancing the development of versatile, visually appealing UIs. Established project frameworks for collaboration.

experience.title: Frontend QA tester
responsibilities: Conducted comprehensive end-to-end testing, balancing manual efforts with automated tests using Selenium, Playwright, and Python, to improve coverage and efficiency.
Coordinated with teams to prioritise and report on defect resolution.
achievements: Played a pivotal role in defect resolution and software enhancements, boosting system stability by 40% and user satisfaction by 30% through UI/UX enhancements.
Leveraged performance testing toolkits, including Java-based tools, to optimise application response times, ensuring stability under peak loads.
Halved the testing cycle time with streamlined automated testing implementations using Java, accelerating the deployment process.

experience.title: Freelance Programmer
responsibilities: Delivered 50+ projects using C++, Python, Flask, TypeScript, React, Angular, and Node.js for 20+ clients annually.
Managed version control with Git and SVN; ensured code quality with Jest, pytest & Selenium.
Enhanced team productivity with Jira, GitLab, and Slack.
Performed debugging and bug fixes, enhancing system stability and user experience.

awards.name: International Collegiate Programming Contest South Pacific
Australian eChallenge
awards.details: Semifinalist from The University of Adelaide & University of South Australia

awards.name: International Student of the Year 2016 for Academic Excellence
